description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 1st November 2019 (RN:19/02256/FULL) for the 'Erection of extensions to the property at the rear and main roof level to Nos. 35, 36, 37 and 38 with alterations to all elevations and internally at all floor levels, all in association with the continued use of the property as a hotel (Class C1). Installation of plant with associated screening at main roof level'; NAMELY, to enable alterations to the fifth floor windows on the front and rear elevations, alterations to suite at fifth floor (suite 501) to create a duplex suite with new windows at rear sixth floor level,  alterations to platform lift between basement and ground floor levels on front elevation and installation of dry riser inlets at ground floor level to the Half Moon Street frontage.
